title: PATHOGEN X
description:
“Pathogen X” is an atmospheric first-person survival horror game in which you have to take on the role of a BRCI special agent named Aiden Clark. He goes on a deadly mission to an underground laboratory to prevent a biological threat and retrieve a sample of Pathogen X.
Biological Threat: you will encounter various terrifying mutations caused by Pathogen X, and must fight for survival in a literally murderous environment where attacking mutants pose a constant threat to you.
Cooperation and guidance: During the mission, you will be assisted by Special Agent Maya Ackerman , who will be in touch with you via satellite channel to bring you up to speed and assist you in solving complex problems.
Horror atmosphere: the enveloping atmosphere and scenery emphasize the terrifying environment of the underground laboratory, where every step can be your last.
Weapons : Find and utilize all the weapons that the underground laboratory complex has to offer in your battle against the terrifying mutants. NINJA SLAYER NEO-SAITAMA IN FLAMES
Deadly and terrible enemies: in the game you will meet different types of enemies with unique features and abilities, from the simplest and stupid, to insanely strong and smart. Find the right approach to defeat them all.
